LanguageData.chvFertility10: Must place on terrain with at no more than 10% fertility.
LanguageData.chvFertility70: Must place on terrain with at least 70% fertility.
LanguageData.chvFertility100: Must place on terrain with at least 100% fertility.
LanguageData.chvFertility140: Must place on terrain with at least 140% fertility.
